issue.title: [Final Event Feature] Proposal to replace CommsClient API with ROS based API

content.raw: Let’s see if we can get enough of thumbs up from the other teams for this. Since the final date has been postponed there is now much more time. The thing is that it should simplify building solution images for everyone so it would be a pity not to have it already for this round.
